column4: A box had been compromised because it had an easy to break password, and a public IP.. I am trying to fix things up.. I wanted to verify that all binaries in the system are the ones that came with the packages..
what is te dpkg command for that ?
like a check all command .. md5 check or something for all binaries
If its compromised you can't be sure that whatever command you use won't be compromised as well
